attributes.action: Ban the use of Blister packs on Environmental Grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a type 2 Diabetic with high blood pressure, and as such have to take six different types of drug daily, whereas before I had 6 glass bottles (which could be recycled), now I have approx 20 different blister packs (2 Months Supply), which fill a rubbish bin, when I asked my Doctor about this, he said it was caused by an EEC Directive.
IF this is true then the EEC is NOT looking after the Environment and the practice should be stopped immediately
